text: Hugh Leo Carey (April 11, 1919 â€“ August 7, 2011) was an American politician and attorney. He was a seven-term United States Representative from 1961 to 1974, as well as 51st Governor of New York from 1975 to 1982. Carey died on August 7, 2011 at his home in Shelter Island, New York of heart failure at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Governors of New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Hugh Carey
